item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

For Monday 12/19/2011:

LAZY LIZARD CAFE

Located on Crown Street just down from the intersection with Temple, Lazy Lizard Cafe just opened in August!  (This is the former location of "Synergy" for those whom knew it.)  The decor is some what eclectic and the food menu contains a variety of dishes.  The Lemon Chicken I tried was quite tasty!  Drinks range from a variety of specialty cocktails, to domestic beers and shots.   (Pool, Darts, ect.)  There are also Large TV's by the Bar, perfect for Sporting Events! (Like Monday Night Football)

 

The Owner Maria has generously offered us these Specials:

$3 Budwiser or Bud Light Pints All Night.

$2 off *all regular prices* woo hoo!

So Please RSVP early to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people! 

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text Dev; number in RSVP. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar.
